subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Stupid but True
msgSnippet: ... There is a bug on the Mac with 10.4 that did not let the font install. However, I fixed the font so that it should be able to install on the Mac now.
messageBody:
Ron Cameron wrote:
>
>
> I'm having trouble getting Thoth to work on the Mac. Especially being
> Unicode, I thought it would work with no problem.
>

There is a bug on the Mac with 10.4 that did not let the font install.
However, I fixed the font so that it should be able to install on the
Mac now. Oliver had the problem until he downloaded the latest version
of the font. I use Thoth on Mac 10.3 and have not had a problem. Let me
know.

Sorry this is not in QS, but I haven't figured out how to get QS to work
with Thunderbird, my email client.

Paul
